profile.label: Push Notifications
profile.no-mobile-needed: A mobile device is not necessary, you can also subscribe to push notifications via your browser.
profile.topic-name: Your private push notification "topic name" is:
profile.topic-secrecy: Treat this topic name like a password!
profile.topic-leakage: If the topic name is leaked, it can be used by others to receive your notifications.
test.title: Test Notification
test.body: If you are receiving this, then that means push notifications are successfully set up on this device.
admin.title: Push Notifications (ntfy)
